summary: A lossless 4096res re-tex of the Amiella armor by Anano
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]KXxnGWH4Ixc#t[/youtube]

Description:
This is a pretty straight forward mod, It's a high quality re-tex of original mod by Anano.
I reallly liked the overall look of the amiella armor but thought the textures could use an update so I made my own. Even though this an entirley original texture set, I tried to stay true to the original look and feel the armor. I hope you enjoy the textures and l report any bugs you come across.

Requirements:
This mod does require Anano's original armor mod.

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16424/?
author: betterbecause
